subject: Football
lead_paragraph: One day after defensive end Michael Strahan unleashed a rant at a reporter who asked him about his comments assessing Plaxico Burress’s effort, the Giants still could not present a unified front.
snippet: One day after defensive end Michael Strahan unleashed a rant at a reporter who asked him about his comments assessing Plaxico Burress’s effort, the Giants still could not present a unified front.
